author: kmarsden
msg: DERBY-5347 Derby loops filling logs and consuming all CPU with repeated error: java.net.SocketException: EDC5122I Input/output error.
If accept does not block and continues to throw errors, retry and log the exception two more times  times at 1 second intervals and then if it still fails, shutdown the server.

author: kkolinko
msg: Use findByte() instead of indexOf(). Implementation is the same, but it is more fair to its arguments.
Limit second string scan using results from the first one.

author: jvs
msg: HIVE-2588 [jira] Update arcconfig to include commit listener
Add CommitListener as an event listener.
Use CommitListener from Arc-JIRA to modify commit message and include `(author
